alert.note: Alert for Tangipahoa (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 6:48AM CST until February 05 at 9:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Mississippi... Tangipahoa River Near Robert affecting Tangipahoa Parish. Biloxi River Near Lyman affecting Harrison County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... West Hobolochitto Creek Near McNeill affecting Pearl River County. Wolf River Above Gulfport affecting Harrison County. For the Tangipahoa River...including Osyka, Kentwood, Amite, Robert...Minor flooding is forecast. For the West Hobolochitto Creek...including McNeill...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Wolf River...including Landon, Gulfport...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Biloxi River...including Wortham, Lyman...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tangipahoa River Near Robert. * WHEN...From this morning to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor flooding near the river with beach areas under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CST this morning the stage was 15.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.0 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.0 feet on 02/28/1984. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations. The next statement will be issued when updates are needed.
